website_summaries.verdict: More than 2,000 reviews can't be wrong. These stylish, supportive sandals are a hands-down favorite.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Leather upper can be stiff and uncomfortable
Manufacturer recommends ordering a full size up

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable with arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Mephisto sandals. They are pricey, but last a long, long time and if the inner sole wears out, Mephisto will replace the inner sole for a price. They are extremely comfortable with arch support. I have very bad, arthritic knees and these sandals help me walk more comfortably. The styles and colors are fun. I love this color. There is a Mephisto outlet/store in Pasadena. I you watch for their sales, you can get good deals. I also recommend Merrell. Less expensive and align the body for comfortable walking. Vionic sandals also have very good arch support and help align the foot/leg.
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: Yay, these shoes are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These sanders are amazing, you might be thinking "wow who describes sandals as amazing?" Well they are! I have fallen arches and these sandals help with my pain. But who wants to wear granny shoes or hippy sandals! These suckers are beautiful, comfortable and helpful. I recommend them to everyone who will listen to me. I am a walking talking advertisement for these bad boys. I love them so much I won't wear anything but Mephisto shoes now. Thank you Mephisto for helping me get my stride back. 🌺
customer_reviews.author: zoë

customer_reviews.title: These are a Must for anyone with Plantar Fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: These "Helen" Mephisto Sandal are AWESOME! I have plantar fasciitis, but I can be on my feet all day wearing these and no pain. I wear these year round! On the rare occasion that I have to wear something different, my feet are killing me in no time. I have worn these for years, I was very hesitant spending so much on a pair of sandals, but decided to take a chance. So glad I did, best decision I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought "new"  was pre-worn!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got home after work, was very happy to see her new sandals had arrived. She opened a package, "not in shoebox". She immediately notices the buckle was undone, then upon a closer look, she noticed toe marks, asked me why did I get her used shoes!!!!!! I said they were new! I PAID $128.60 Please see the photos. This manufacture makes great shoes, I question the seller!! I now will be calling Amazon Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not a size 9
customer_reviews.text: I have worn mephisto sandals for years. I have always worn a size 9/39. I ordered a pair of these sandals in size 9 last summer and they were almost an inch shorter than my 2 previous pairs of size nines and a 1/2 an inch narrower. The arch support is even in the wrong place. I have always been able to order nines and have them fit, so I'm not sure what happened with this pair. I couldn't return them because I had worn them. Now, I need to get a pair of sandals that fit and I'm afraid to order them because I don't know if this is new sizing or just a miss-sized pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty narrow in the toe area. I do have a wide foot, but generally am able to wear regular width sandals. I ordered a size 10 which was a Euro size 40. I typically wear a size 9.5 in most shoes, 41 in Dansko, and 40 or 41 in Birkenstock. The straps fit fine, the toe split was comfortable, the leather soft, and the insole was gloriously soft suede. Sadly my little toe was hanging completely over the side of the footbed. Cute shoe, but not suitable if you have wide toes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have had 6 pairs of this same model of Mephisto sandals. They last forever! I have had one pair now for 14 years! They are super comfortable and do provide a fair amount of arch support. If I had more money than I do, I would buy them in a lot more colors. They are fairly expensive, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LagunaLady

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Sandals
customer_reviews.text: My first pair went through Europe 6 times and lasted almost 10 years!
customer_reviews.author: Cape Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great relief from plantar faciatis.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned at least 12 pair of the Mephisto Helen sandal. Years ago my podiatrist recommended them for my plantar faciatis. I've used $500 orthotics but these sandals provide much better relief. When I put them on my feet say "Aah". I wear them year round. I purchased flip flop socks this year to wear during cold weather. A great move. These sandals last a LONG time. (5 to 8 yrs.) The first pair took some getting used too since the thong between the toe needed to soften up and it may take some time for your foot to adapt to the high arch. I highly recommend these shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Headley

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Two days of wearing and these are the most comfortable sandals I've worn. Love my Birks but these are more comfortable. I do think the a tiny bit smaller than Birks. I wear a 6 1/2 and bought EU size 37 and the fit is perfect. Depending on the brand a 37 is shown as a 6-6/12 or a 7. I would say they are a 6 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! Don’t size up!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Mephistos and I’m very pleased. I was concerned that some reviews said to order a size up, as these were a last-minute purchase before vacation. I took a chance and went with my usual size in Birkenstocks, a 35. These fit perfectly! In my opinion, I do not recommend moving up a size if you wear a certain size in Birkenstock. There was a breaking-in period of about a day, but they eventually loosened up and now they feel like a dream! I’m definitely going to buy a few more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: spazzysteph

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my feet for 8-10 hours a day standing on a concrete floor and I need something that is stylish as well as comfortable and
customer_reviews.text: I work retail and have for 30 years, I'm on my feet for 8-10 hours a day standing on a concrete floor and I need something that is stylish as well as comfortable and these are my #1 go to style of shoes. I just got back from a 4 day convention where I walked for 4 solid days (10K steps each day according to my fitbit) and very little discomfort considering my aging feet:-) I purchased my first pair of Mephisto sandals 5 years ago and I they are the very first pair of sandals I will buy! They offer a fairly large assortment of colors and a few patterns which I LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Leah M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandals for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with my feet in the metatarsal area and these sandals are absolutely wonderful and comfortable! I also have a very narrow feet and these fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A. Ostby

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was so torn between these shoes and another pair of blue sandals. I ended up returning these because the other blue shoes were just a little more versatile for my needs. I may end up purchasing these again later. They are comfortable, true to size and the snake skin pattern is beautiful! I already have a pair of navy suede sandals and these would have been my 3rd pair of blue shoes. Just couldn’t justify a 3rd pair of the same color shoes as I’m trying to down size my closet.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingDiva

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I loved this brand in the past but these are so incredibly uncomfortable. After one day of struggling through and hoping they would "stretch" out a little, I had blisters and cuts all over. My daughter who wears the same size I do also tried them and experienced the same thing. Unfortunately I cannot return them because I wore them outside which is such a bummer. They are pricey and just fit horribly. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Taxi mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These have got to be the most comfortable sandal I've ever purchased. I ordered them for a trip I was going to take that required a lot of walking, mid shipment the trip was canceled. I hesitated trying them on because once I received them I really didn't need them any longer. Well, I couldn't help myself, the foot went in and I was hooked. I would never have paid this much for a sandal but they're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but stiff and do not cater to my foot needs.
customer_reviews.text: Due to foot issues this sandle was recommended to me. I am not a fan of expensive footwear, but gave it a try due to the write ups promoting this product to be good for plantar fasciitis and such foot issues. I like the look, the design, the color, but it is not as comfortable as I'd hoped for the price I paid. My feet ache after a short period of time, but I'm thinking it's not the sandle but rather my own personal foot issues. These sandles are not the cure I hoped them to be, but I do like them considering.
customer_reviews.author: jmacdonald

customer_reviews.title: Love Those Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals-a little expensive but worth it for my arches-try to buy every 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Carole D. Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Orthotic foot bed, great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is about my 8th pair of these. Started buy about 25 years ago. Really good for women with plantar fasciitis the best sandals I have ever worn. And these were a really good buy
customer_reviews.author: gayle51

customer_reviews.title: Blister, Mister!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are stiff and the straps rubbed blisters on the top of my feet. I always buy Birkenstocks, but thought I would try this brand because a podiatrist recommended them. Obviously, she's never tried Birkenstocks. I gave them to my son's girlfriend, she liked the way the looked; I don't know if she had issues with them rubbing her or not. I'll stick with my Birks. I do not recommend these sandals. They are pricey and by the time you get the blisters you can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small!
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! These shoes run extremely small! I wear an 8, but I bought a 9 for width due to a foot injury. The 9 was too short, I love the shoe but I’m afraid to order a 10 because the one I have may be mismarked! The add say they run true to size, NOT true. Order 1-2 sizes up!
customer_reviews.author: Marla J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Helen sandals. I keep buying them because the fit and arch support. I’ve had plantar fascia in the past and the were recommended by my podiatrist.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Speed

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to love these. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to love these. Unfortunately, the toe box area narrowed down too much and my pinky toes rubbed on the curled-up edges. Also, I ordered a size 12 so they would be a half-size large. Mephisto seems to view a 42 instead of a 43 as a 12. Other than that, I appreciate the soles and edges being close to the strapping color. I needed a pair of ‘nude’ shoes and I didn’t like other brands’ having a black bottom. I’m sad to return these, but the pinky toe rub isn’t going to do at all!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Vanderweele

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. I bought these to help with plantar fasciitis. When I opened the box, I was so excited. They are so pretty and sparkly. I was so disappointed when I put them on....the leather is very stiff and the footbed is extremely hard. I sent them back. For the cost of these shoes, I was expecting them to be very comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: FLGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to replace a pair I had had for 20 years, that’s how well made these Sandler’s are. They are very comfortable and cushion your step. Do not get them wet, my old pair only wore out because the cork got wet at some point over the years. Other than that, they are well made with beautiful leather.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit wide and turns your feet black!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in black because they were discounted. I like the fit, even though I have to cinch way down on the buckle because I have narrow feet. But I like the comfort of these shoes. However, I don't like the fact that they do turn your feet black. I have drier skin so I thought it wouldn't happen to me, but it did. I still like the shoes but would not buy black again!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are true to form. Very comfortable foot bed, heel bed, arch support, toe loops are perfect and comfy and help my foot with a bunion, sandals are mobility so that I don't over pronate - very important! Comfortable to walk in and the Spice color is beautiful. Worth every penny! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Francine A. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit and comfortable and style. So far seems to have good support.
customer_reviews.author: Humaira Dale

customer_reviews.title: Not advised for boney feet.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good choice for women with narrow, boney feet. Okay to wear in and out of stores but not an all day wear shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 pairs of Mephistopheles sandals like the style I already have, only different colors. All five have a more narrow footbed than the pair I own that I bought at a storefront shop that specialies in walking shoes and Mephisto brand
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful sandals
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, and they hold up well. It was time to replace the ones I purchased years ago in FL, and I had no doubt I would get another white pair and another black pair. The black pair I found locally, confirmed that I was still a size 37 or 7, (altho in US shoes I tend to wear an 8). I won't be without these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: P. Gotcher

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. It is my second pair of these and I highly recommend them to anyone who needs extra supportive shoes with shock absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sandal!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair - I wear them so frequently I wear them out. Love the dark brown color - goes with everything. The arch support is great and so I can wear these sandals all day long. I like the toe loop -- I'm not a fan of thongs because I don't like something pressing between my toes. The leather does stretch after a couple of years wear but I just buckle 'em up tighter. Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mephistos are quickly becoming my favorite brand!
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as expected. I typically wear size 7, trusted the sizing guide & purchased 37. Perfect amount of space at toe & heel, not to long, not right at the edges! Very comfortable, wonderful quality so far!
customer_reviews.author: srh

customer_reviews.title: Quality! Style! Support!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a quality sandal! The genuine leather is so soft. I have had no issue of rubbing like low quality sandals will do in my experience. And designed to have support built in the sole. Wish they weren’t quite so expensive but these truly are high quality. I imagine they will last me a long time! I like these better than Birgenstock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I've been searching for ages trying to find the perfect pair and these are it! They have excellent support for my high arches and are a lot more comfortable than Birkenstocks. I usually wear a 6.5 medium but ordered a 5 narrow and they fit perfectly; not too long or bulky. I definitely recommend these sandals if you have sore feet or need arch support.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: The size was right and they came really fast, but the sandals looked like they had been sitting in a warehouse for the last 10 years. The leather was dry and stiff and the soles were hard and completely inflexible. They weren’t like any other shoes I have ordered from this brand. I don’t know if I will take a chance on this company again. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Robinred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mephisto’s!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about ordering Mephisto‘s on Amazon. I have been wearing them for years and they are the best comfortable support Sandals I have used! I was leaving for vacation and needed a new pair in a hurry so I decided to give Amazon a chance with these sandals. They are perfect like every other Mephisto I have ever purchased! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Stokes

customer_reviews.title: BEST Support for Plantar Fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, amazingly comfortable right out of the box, and offers the best support for --- and relief from --- plantar fasciitis issues than any shoe I have tried! I can hardly wait to order my next pair!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Olive

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable modeled Thongs that come in all Colors.
customer_reviews.text: I have bot these sandals before and lasted along time. (Years) What I love of these is they model into your feet and your toes that match you. They are the most comfortable things you could ware. They are quite expensive but worth it. I will always continue to buy them. That are easy to Clean
customer_reviews.author: Trudi MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sandals I’ve Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these sandals! I have been wearing them for years. This is my 4th or 5th pair. The are comfortable, mold to your foot, provide support and I can wear them all day. They are so well made they last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: The straps are cardboard like. Not soft and pliable as the older styles. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ingi

customer_reviews.title: They help with arch support pain
customer_reviews.text: Love these anyone with arch support pain needs these... and they are fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of Mephisto in Nice France when I was suffering from plantar fasciitis. I finally had to break down and get a new pair! I was worried about having to break in a new pair, but these were comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Mephisto sandals for 15 years...with that I am on my third pair. These new ones do not appear to have the same quality as the ones I have had. Now this is the first time I have bought them from amazon. The thickness of the soles are not as large plus the quality of the sole is not there. The sole on the left is fraying and I have only had them for 3 months....I will be lucky if they last the season! It looks like $149 down the drain. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: lynn wald

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a pair of these sandals in black every year for 11 years & they are always the same. They have great arch support & are very comfortable. They are worth the money, I've stopped buying knock-offs because they are never as good and you just waste money because they can't be returned. I keep an old pair to wear to the beach or for messy projects like painting so I don't ruin the new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can wear toe strap
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked and felt wonderful, except that I am not used to wearing the strap around the toe. That aggravated me. I am one of the few people that might bother. I wanted to wear them because the foot bed was so comfortable, and they looked so pretty on my feet. I did return them.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, gave me lower back/hip pain
customer_reviews.text: These fit an entire size too small and had to order up- even after I got the correct size these KILLED my feet and definitely made my plantar fasciitis worse than ever plus added intense lower back and hip pain. I was really hopeful after all the positive reviews but must be an exception to the norm - however very easy to return for a refund so I appreciated that! The look was cute, just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Zeeb

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe - it's a very nice addition added to my collection. I've been wearing the Helen sandals for many years and love the comfort, fit and look of the shoes. I have over a dozen pairs for various outfits and another 5 older pairs that are now relegated for gardening, housework, etc. My feet are SO grateful. ; )
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was great even though my refund time had expired! I buy Mephisto sandals all the time, but never online. They don’t feel like my past purchases. It almost seems like a knock-off. I wore them once & let my return window expire so now i am stuck with an expensive sandal that I won’t wear. I won’t this brand online again.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these and get tons of compliments from others on them. Love that Mephisto has air holes in the soles now - really prevents these from smelling as badly as other sandals with this kind of footbed. Totally comfortable, I've walked many miles in these, straps caused some minor issues on my feet at first, but they're all fine now and I can walk miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Koronides

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for your feet
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of these shoes. Amazing styling. Swapped my normal 7 for a 6.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Neny

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for my happy feet :)
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Mephisto shoe! I can wear this shoe with everything. It is so comfortable and the lines are so clean. The shoe color is a light taupe which goes with everything; I can wear all day without it bothering my plantar fasciitis or my knees (surgery on right knee). Love them so much better than a Birk!
customer_reviews.author: Blondemomints

customer_reviews.title: I probably shouldn’t even write a review because
customer_reviews.text: I probably shouldn’t even write a review because I ended up returning them. The leather just felt a little too hard between my toes and I thought it would rub my skin. I didn’t feel like breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that I bought because I loved the first pair so much. I've been wearing them constantly because they're so comfortable ... no stress... never even think about them all day. Expensive ... but worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall R. Finnerty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: My wife says: "Love the subtle sparkle and color. Super comfortable. Fits my foot better than a Birkenstock (better for wide feet). This shoe is perfect for an average to narrower foot."
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I've tried birkenstocks & they hurt my feet. I have plantar fascilitis so pretty picky about my shoes. These Memphistos have cushion & a slight arch & feel great! I was pleasantly surprised. So much so that I've ordered these same shoes in 3 difft colors, ha! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look a little more dressed up that my birkenstocks. Be aware that they run a little bit smaller and don't have the arch support that Birkenstocks do. But, they are good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sandal
customer_reviews.text: The color looks more goldish in person than pink and silver like the picture. It is a gorgeous sandal but the pink is very subtle. The fit is perfect and the shoe is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LindyBear23

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for years. My only complaint is Quality of leather is declining. Hope they return to the Quality we expect from a shoe in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Mephisto sandals for years, so I am familiar with the quality. I ordered two pair one is fine the other one looks like it is a second. surface of strap is not quality, and underneath the straps look like they are cut wrong. Unfortunately the packaging was thrown away before I looked at the sandal ( my error) so they cannot be returned. Lesson do not throw packaging away before examining the sandal.
customer_reviews.author: gs

customer_reviews.title: Shoe comes in European size. This company does not use the European shoe size guide on their site.
customer_reviews.text: Know that you must specify the European size somewhere on the order. Although they do not ask for it. They only supply you with a U.S shoe size chart. I wear 8 in U.S size and a 39 in European. An 8 can be either 38 OR 39. They mailed me 38. It doesn't fit. I live in Rep. Panama. I can not mail the shoe back for an exchange with out spending $20 to a private mail courier to mail it out of the country! Expensive shoe that I'm taking a loss for.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Critides

customer_reviews.title: Cures plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Mephistopheles shoes for my plantar fasciitis. I’m so sold on them. I went to a cheaper sandal for awhile, and it came back. Now I’m faithful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made sandal
customer_reviews.text: Worn for about a month now. Good support while walking I can wear them for several hours and my feet don’t get sore. The leather strapping has stretched a little but not enough that I need to adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Suemmn

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! Runs smaller than Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: These were really pretty! I’ve owned this style before in men’s. I was pretty excited to get something feminine. But- they were a tad too short and narrow. I wear a 43 or 12 12.5 in Birkenstock’s so I thought these in 13 would fit. They didn’t. I was really sad to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Mephisto's many years ago when I was having issues with plantar fasciitis during a road trip (good times). These sandals gave me 'immediate' comfort while I worked through stretching out the foot muscles and allowed me to walk without cringing; best sandals I have ever owned and I won't look at anything else because now I am spoiled from Mephisto. This is my 5th pair. They last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: TOE "STRAP" HURTS LIKE HELL
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this: Love the brand and the shoe in general, but the construction of the toe strap is a slit that bites into the skin after a few hours. Too uncomfortable to break in...
customer_reviews.author: CookLikeABoss®️

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute, order size up
customer_reviews.text: Love this sandal. So freakin comfortable and cute to boot. I did follow recs to order up and I’m glad I did. I wear a size 7.5 and ordered a size 8- it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: balli

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on Mephisto sandals for quite a while, and finally took the plunge after trying in a few pairs in retail stores on vacation. I have had bouts of plantar fasciitis over the years, and am extremely choosy about my footwear, so when the Mephistos arrived I was cautiously optimistic. Much as I had wanted these sandals, I was ready to return them if they weren't exactly what I was looking for in terms of fit and comfort. I am delighted to say that my Helen sandals are perfect. I am tempted to get additional colors I love them so much! I've worn them almost full item since they arrived, both indoors and out!
customer_reviews.author: LMc

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME sandals!!!
customer_reviews.text: My third pair!! Last pair lasted 8 years!! The most comfortable shoes I’ve ever had. Over time they mold to your foot size and shape. Goes with almost anything. Great walking shoe!!! Love, love, love!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Long

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable style
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and Achilles tendinitis and a heel spur. I can walk in this show all day comfortably. I wore this shoe 3x before it felt “broken in”.? I love how stylish and modern it looks while comfortable at the same time. I
customer_reviews.author: T. Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy and CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair for both of my sisters for their birthdays. They both have bad knees and are always looking for comfortable shoes. They told me they LOVE THEM! They are not as chunky as a Birkenstock and cuter in my view. The navy is a really pretty color and the fit was perfect. They are both size 8 and they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen N

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 15th pair of Mephisto Helen’s that I have purchased. I have a variety of colors and styles and have worn them for years. I love wearing them because they are so comfortable. Periodically I buy other sandals, but I always go back to my Mephistos because they are by far the most comfortable and easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother last Christmas and she absolutely loves them. She used to have a pair of similar shoes a while back that my dad started threatening to throw out because they were so worn. We saw a lady in the airport wearing this brand and style that my liked and we asked her about them. She had great things to say about them so I took a mental note and surprised her for Christmas with them. She had completely forgotten the name. Now she has thrown away the old pair and wears these. She claims they are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Is there any other sandal???
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals.....I would have been in a wheelchair several years ago if I hadn't found these sandals. I have bought 9 pair since then. It is the only shoe I wear EVER, but Hallelujah!!! They come in several colors and this is the only style I want or need. I've had to advance to a Happy Feet insole due to birth defects that have overtime (I am 67 years) dictated that I have more secure structure for my feet. The Sandals with the insoles added, has made me a happy camper! Each pair lasts me 2 or more years, but I still pass them on to others to experience. LOVE THESE "HELEN" SANDALS FROM MEPHISO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is fine, but wrong item delivered
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping these shoes, although I consider this a bait and switch. I ordered black, but did not notice that when the item appears in your cart, it is changed to Helen Mix style.
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: Better than Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: Stopped buying Birkenstock’s as the cork beds kept cracking. So happy to have found this brand. Much more comfortable and longer lasting! This is my second pair - different color
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent footbed
customer_reviews.text: I have four Mephisto sandals. The footbed is magical. I have arthritic knees and these sandals allow me to stand without joint pain. I had a problem with delivery and customer service stepped in right away to resolve the issue. They were extremely helpful. The sandals are expensive but they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As expected the leather sandals were stiff and somewhat tight across my foot. After wearing them for about a week now the leather sandals have stretched and are no longer tight across my foot. They are a very comfortable shoes and will be ordering different colors in this style.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Quality sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Bought, returned, now repurchased. Wasn’t used to them/familiar with fit and feel upon first purchase but now that I am, I LOVE them. GREAT sandals — comfortable, stylish, beautiful, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jewn

customer_reviews.title: I have been wearing the shoes/sandals for 25 plus years!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes for years. I couldn't believe I need a larger size. I can't believe my feet has grown, I am a Grandmother!
customer_reviews.author: JeanP

customer_reviews.title: Love them for style & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fab fit, fab color, fab comfort! Stand wrk all day on my ft & these Mephistos r simply lifesavers that look grr and get loads of compliments! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Booneflagrl

customer_reviews.title: Stylish alternative to the Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a trip to Europe. I wanted to look stylish but also be comfy, and these did not disappoint! I can wear these with skirts and dresses, but also jeans and casual shorts. So versatile! Nice that they add a little height too. Great arch support and they mold to your feet after a couple wears. I like the toe strap, they prevent the foot from sliding forward with every step (an issue I have with my Birkenstocks). These are a liiiittle bulky but you get used to it pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rupali

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfort an d style!
customer_reviews.text: They not only look great, the stay on, fabulous arch support and the cork bed gives just the right cushioning. Plan to buy more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Magenta

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: BEST sandals I buy new pair each yr. This particular pair received many compliments on color & style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable , durable and really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have a serious Hallux Valgus - bunion , which is worst on my left foot , these flip flop are perfect for my bunion , roomy. The Helen are perfect , comfortable, and great for my high arch. I bought size 37 Europe , I usually wear 6.5 US wide or size 7 US. I took these all over the world! I highly recommend Mephisto!
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sandals, ever. My daughter has fallen arches & these have been a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Mcfarlane

customer_reviews.title: Great sandles that last
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair love these sandles. Arch supports are perfect for my low arch foot
customer_reviews.author: S. Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal, I'd say runs a tad bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Really attractive sandal for what it is. Nice leather, very comfortable. I am a straight size 8, average width foot, ordered the 38. I was at the very edge in length and width, so am exchanging for a 39. The straps were perfect, I simply need a bit more room in the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: Jcp

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and flattering shoe that fits like a glove. The design has a good foot cushion and support. I have a similar style in Birkenstock, but these are different in that the footbed molded to my foot much quicker. These are my go to sandals and thinking about getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair & I ware them every day. they look good feel good & they last forever. I just bought another pair just because you never can have to much of a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lee Horn

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would be more narrow than Birkenstocks going by reviews I'd read. Unfortunately, they are too wide for my narrow feet! I did find the length to run on the short side. In other words, they are shorter and wider than I could use. On the plus side, it looked to be a very well-made and comfortable shoe if you find your correct fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly and are as comfortable as the other pairs I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes in the world!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of Mephisto sandals about 10 years ago and I have loved them ever since. When it as time to replace them, I was so happy to find them at Amazon, and I loved all the color selections. I get all kinds of compliments on how cute these new blue sandals are, and they are every bit as comfortable as my first pair. I have high arches and finding shoes that I can wear all day without ending up with aching feet is always a challenge. I highly recommend these sandals. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Cresse

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Women's Helen Thong Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandals, but I was looking for the thicker distressed leather.
customer_reviews.author: Patch

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Modern, Comfortable with Great Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I am a mephisto fan as they fit my narrow feet with high arch perfectly. These are fabulous. I have them in the "waxy" shiny red and the "waxy" shiny blue. The pop of color adds some pizazz and look very stylish and less granny ortho shoes. I wear these with pants and dresses. The support is great and the suede is cushy (more cushy than birkenstock) with very good arch support. I can walk all days in these.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. The color is more pink than I expected, but I'm good with that. The problem is that the straps are not compliant enough and they are the only pair of my five that rub my feet. They are causing blisters medially, up by my ankle. After a couple times, you would think I would smarten up and sell them on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Best supporting sandal!
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto are my favorite sandal. They have great arch support and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lar and Lou

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, comfortable shoe but could be better
customer_reviews.text: They started out narrow but have stretched. Wish the toe area was not "cupped" - would be more comfortable if my small toes didn't rub against the little "wall". I understand cupping the heel but no real reason to cup the toes. They look great and are super comfy for the most part. Not as wide or ugly as other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Verrazzano

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd pair of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have foot issues and have bought a dozen different pairs of sandals trying to find something I could walk in. Ran across these shoes that I bought years ago, so just bought these again, but in a different color. This pair is called Bronze. It’s not very “Bronzey” but definitely metallic looking.
customer_reviews.author: GJA

product_meta.title: Mephisto Women's Helen Thong Sandals
product_meta.description:
Comfort sandals incorporating mephisto soft-air technology along with cork/latex footbeds for miles of comfortable walking. Rubber soles and top grain leathers complete the total comfort package.

The Helen from Mephisto is the perfect casual sandal for providing all-day walking comfort. The leather upper is sleek and stylish, while the contoured, shock-absorbing footbed provides comfort and better stability for your feet. Throw in an adjustable strap for a better fit and a rubber non-slip sole, and this shoe is sure to keep you on your toes.

Mephisto makes some of the finest walking shoes on earth. Their comfort, support and durability are recognized wherever people are serious about walking. For more than three decades, Mephisto has been on the forefront of walking-shoe innovation. Mephisto’s natural products are handmade of leather, latex, cork and rubber.

See more
feature_bullets: Asymmetric thong sandal with adjustable buckled strap featuring cork midsole and contoured footbed
